    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109713</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculation of the wavelength of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung der Wellenlänge des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcul de la longueur d'onde de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cálculo do wavelength da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolo della lunghezza d'onda di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός του μήκους κύματος του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cálculo de la longitud de onda de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the quantities involved in calculating for the wavelength of two coherent light sources used in a two-slit experiment.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dark fringes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interference patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light fringes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slit size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">two slit experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die 
Quantitäten, die mit einbezogen werden, bei der Berechnung für die 
Wellenlänge von zwei kohärenten Lichtquellen, die in verwendet 
werden, Experiment zwei-aufschlitzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que les quantités 
impliquées dans le calcul pour la longueur d'onde de deux sources 
lumineuses logiques utilisées dans deux-fendent l'expérience.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as quantidades 
envolvidas no cálculo para o wavelength de duas fontes claras 
coherent usadas no dois-cortam a experiência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che le quantità 
addette alla calcolazione per la lunghezza d'onda di due fonti di luce
coerenti usate in due-fendono l'esperimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις ποσότητες που 
περιλαμβάνονται στον υπολογισμό για το μήκος κύματος δύο συνεπών
πηγών φωτός που χρησιμοποιούνται σε ένα πείραμα δύο-σχισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las cantidades 
implicadas en calcular para la longitud de onda de dos fuentes de luz 
coherentes usadas en dos-rajan el experimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dunkle Fransen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
